name: Dodgeshifter
description:
Game Descrpition

Taking adventure to monster, the monsters and shifter has each round to attack back.

Monster would place in different place to attack and the shifter should shift the grid to connect up magic balls to create energy for firing back.

There at least 3 magic balls links to each other to gernerate fire and traverse to four directions.

Controls

  1. Up/Left/Down/Right: shift grid and get away fire.
  2. Button
    1. Pause: pause the game
    2. Restart: restart current chapter
    3. Back: back to menu
    4. Sound: mute

Credits

  • “Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“
  • “Music from https://www.zapsplat.com“

Install Instructions

  1. Un-zip the file
  2. Open "DodgeShifter.exe"
  3. Shifting!!!

Tip:

More magic balls link alone to one direction, the more power to hurt monster.
